Anand College Of Engineering And Management , Kapurthala,Punjab was established in the year 2010 under the aegis of Anand Educational Trust in order to provide value based and affordable education to students.
Since inception college has strived to provide best engineering education through highly qualified faculty and well equipped labs College is affiliated to Punjab Technical University College is approved by AICTE College has partner with companies and organizations to provide field education and employment College provide degree and diploma courses in the field of engineering and technology
